page.title: 18CROPWELL BUTLER SINGERS
page.content: The{Belvoir Revellers}are a Concert Party based at Cropwell Butler. They meet weekly and rehearse and perform with an electronic organ. They have been formed for about 10 years, and comprise usually six men and six ladies who live either at Cropwell Butler, or in other villages in the Vale of Belvoir. About twenty concerts are given annually, mainly between October and March at Harvest Suppers, Christmas Parties and in Homes for the Elderly. It has become tradition to finish the season in March by performing three concerts at Cropwell Butler. The proceeds from these concerts go to the Church Funds and, fortunately, these three concerts are always sold out!
